title: Teacher Training Program for Mobile-Based Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on designing mobile learning linked to mathematics curricula in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematics problem sets tailored to individual proficiency levels using mobile applications
Learners can capture, edit, and present mathematics tasks connected to real-world problems via mobile devices
Teachers can share feedback on mathematics lesson design with colleagues using group-based mobile collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
